skills.name: Crimson Blade
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG to a single target, with a high chance to Burn the target.

skills.name: Combustion Slash
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG to a single target and units adjacent to the target. This attack prioritizes targets afflicted with Burn.

skills.name: Melt
skills.desc: After attacking a Burned target, receives a DMG increase.

skills.name: High-Temperature Operation
skills.desc: Slightly increases ATK and greatly increases SPD. This buff is dispelled upon Weakness Break.

skills.name: Dancing Cinders
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG to all targets. Targets suffering from Burn are dealt an extra Fire DMG and have Burn removed.
